alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:56PM EDT until July 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTY... At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hague, or 14 miles north of Whitehall, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hague, Scaroon Manor Public Campground, Rogers Rock Campground, Eagle Point Campground, Indian Kettles, Graphite, Adirondack, Silver Bay, Pottersville and Coates Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
